title: 107_hr131
content: The Inland Empire Regional Water Recycling Project is added to the Reclamation Wastewater and Groundwater Study and Facilities Act. The Secretary may participate in the Inland Empire regional water recycling project with a federal cost share not exceeding 25%. Funds provided by the Secretary cannot be used for project operation or maintenance. $20,000,000 is authorized for this project. "Sec. 1636. Regional brine lines added to the Reclamation Wastewater and Groundwater Study and Facilities Act." The Secretary may carry out a program under the Federal reclamation laws to assist agencies in projects to construct regional brine lines in Southern California and San Francisco Bay/Santa Clara Valley for salinity management as identified in specific studies. Federal reclamation laws can assist water agencies in constructing regional brine lines in the San Francisco Bay area and the Santa Clara Valley area, California. The Secretary may enter agreements and regulations as needed. The Federal share of project costs shall not exceed 25% or $50,000,000, and for studies, it shall be 50%. Funds provided by the Secretary cannot be used for project operation or maintenance. The text chunk discusses a conforming amendment related to project funding and limitations on the use of funds provided by the Secretary for project operation or maintenance. SEC. 1637. LOWER CHINO DAIRY AREA DESALINATION DEMONSTRATION AND RECLAMATION PROJECT. This section amends the Reclamation Wastewater and Groundwater Study and Facilities Act to include a new project for desalination and reclamation in the Lower Chino Dairy Area. The Secretary, in cooperation with various water agencies, will participate in the Lower Chino Dairy Area desalination project. The Federal share of the project cost is limited to 25% or $50,000,000. Funds provided by the Secretary cannot be used for project operation or maintenance. Authorization of appropriations is granted for the project. Conforming Amendment: The table of sections in Public Law 102-575 is amended by inserting a new section after section 1636. Lower Chino Dairy Area desalination demonstration and reclamation project.
